content.text: and is very devout. Like many religious stars, she credits her success to God, saying:

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland Can't Be Without Her Bible on Tour
content.text: It's been my faith that has gotten me to where I am right now. It's been my faith that has kept me in the game for 15 years when I wanted to give up at certain times.

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland on Destiny's Child and Her Gospel Turn
content.text: Rowland's music career began in church

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland's Charity Work, Events and Causes
content.text: and much of Rowland's charity work revolves around her Houston Methodist church.

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland Can't Be Without Her Bible on Tour
content.text: Now, she says she can't go on tour without her Bible.
Really, Rowland "can't live" without her faith:

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland couldn't live without religion
content.text: I can't live without it. As kids we were so on fire for God… If all this were taken away from me right now I would still have my faith. If you don't have faith the world will eat you alive.

Rowland is a Democrat and an Obama supporter–though her support is a bit subdued compared to many other celebrities. She mostly shows her Obama allegiance through her Twitter account–tweeting quotes from both the president

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland: Another good Michelle Obama…

content.text: Proof that Rowland takes at least some liberal positions is her unwavering support of and by the gay community. In Australia, she just came out and said it:

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland believes in female leaders and would date a Sydney man
content.text: I think anyone who wants to be married should be married it doesn't matter if you are gay, straight or whatever, it's a celebration of love. Who am I to judge anybody?

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland interviewed by Perez Hilton
content.text: She participates in gay rallies and parades
and is quick to express her gratitude to the gay community for their continued support of her and her music, saying:

content.sourceTitle: Kelly Rowland: Gay Fans Give Me Strength
content.text: My gay fans are the reason I'm here, you know what I mean. For me, the gay community provides so much strength and I really say this with from the heart.
Other political issues–economics, immigration, the environment–haven't made Rowland's list of hot topics–yet. Keep us posted in the comments.
